sentences.english: Last principle is to be decisive and strict in giving out rewards and administering punishments.

sentences.english: Eliminate distractions when you need to focus on time-sensitive material.
sentences.chinese: 在做時間敏感的材料時，要避免精神渙散。

sentences.english: Europe's unraveling is also a problem for Americans.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲的人心渙散同樣也是美國人的難題。

sentences.english: Sixth, the general attention of young patients with schizophrenia and lax.

sentences.english: They can be removed by the practice of the concentration upon a single truth.
sentences.chinese: 專注於一個真理可以消除精神渙散。

sentences.english: The "listlessness" of literary criticism leads the operation of criticism gradually into a small circle".

sentences.english: Accounting information forge cases rise one after another.
sentences.chinese: 會計信息造假案此起彼伏，股市人心渙散。

sentences.english: Some Party organizations are feeble and lax.
They can be removed by the practice of concentration upon a single truth.
sentences.chinese: 專注於一個真理可以消除精神渙散。

sentences.english: They may be overcome in the same manner as the obstacles to enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 可以用消除覺悟之障礙的同樣方式來克服精神渙散。

sentences.english: This leads to the other extreme, weakness and laxity .
sentences.chinese: 這就走到軟弱渙散的另一個極端。

sentences.english: Besides, nothing would be worse than living in three different places in on semester.
sentences.chinese: 此外，沒有什麼十二比一學期渙散各地方銖更糟糕了。

sentences.english: A lack of choline can cause impairment of memory and concentration.
sentences.chinese: 膽鹼的缺乏會導致記憶力下降和精神渙散。
